headline: Occidental Petroleum Corporation (OXY): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Occidental Petroleum Corporation (OXY) on Substack by Oliver | MMMT Wealth. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on OXY. Occidental Petroleum Corporation (OXY)’s share was trading at $39.83 as of April 23rd. OXY’s trailing and forward P/E were 17.62 and 17.86 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Occidental […]
